title: Please help to id this font.
author: TheYagich

comments.content:
Can't find a match but pretty convinced there's one, probably an obscur techy freebie... May be having a look to DaFont [Techno \> Sci-fi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317103018/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303) and [Techno \> Various](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317103018/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=304) sections at DaFont would worth a shot.  
Alternative: [Batman Forever](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317103018/http:/www.dafont.com/fr/batman-forever.font)

**[Aeromatics Small Caps NC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317103018/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Aeromatics%20Small%20Caps%20NC%20-%20Regular&fid=91937851cdad98d8ad79cbb9b24f08f0&fsize=60&text=MINECRAFT%201.7%2B&fit=1)** by Jayvee D. Enaguas [2009]  
More on Jayvee D. Enaguas:  
 [http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-54805.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317103018/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-54805.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-54805.html")

Note: There are more fonts which begin with "Aeromatics" or "Aero Matics" prefix, created by the same designer
